com.versant.fund
Interface ClassBuilder

All Known Subinterfaces:
Session, SessionWithDatabase
public interface ClassBuilder

An intermediate type used to provide optional arguments to defineClass(). The Session Interface extends the ClassBuilder interface.

Example Usage: 

 ClassHandle ch = session
 .withDatabase("thatDB")          // returns SessionWithDatabase
 .withAttrBuilders(newAttrs)      // returns ClassBuilder
 .withSuperBuilders(newSupers)    // returns ClassBuilder
 .defineClass("myNewClassName");  // returns ClassHandle

See Also:
Session, SessionWithDatabase

Method Summary
 ClassHandle defineClass(java.lang.String newName)
          Defines a database schema class of the specified name with the attributes specified in the attrBuilder and with the super classes specified super builder, returning its ClassHandle
 ClassBuilder withAttrBuilders(AttrBuilder[] newAttrs)
          Specifies the attributes for defineClass().
 ClassBuilder withSuperBuilders(SuperBuilder[] newSupers)
          Specifies the super classes for defineClass().

Specifies the attributes for defineClass().

Parameters:

See Also:

withSuperBuilders

ClassBuilder withSuperBuilders(SuperBuilder[] newSupers)
Specifies the super classes for defineClass().

Parameters:
newSupers - The super classes of the class.

See Also:

defineClass

ClassHandle defineClass(java.lang.String newName)
Defines a database schema class of the specified name with the attributes specified in the attrBuilder and with the super classes specified super builder, returning its ClassHandle

Parameters:
newName - the name of the new class being defined
